Name: Effects of ON/OFF deep brain stimulation on cognitive control in treatment-resistant depression (EEG)
Acknowledgements: We gratefully acknowledge technical assistance from Amanda Arulpragasam, Andrew Corse, Nina Levar, and Tommi Raij with subject recruitment and data collection.
HowToAcknowledge: Please cite the references below and consider including the following message: 'This data was obtained from the OpenNeuro database. Its accession number is ds001784.'
